cause.description:
Show tribute to all those fine men and women we have lost throughout the bloody war in Iraq and Afghanistan...Let us show that we still honor our brothers that have fallen in combat, those that will continue to fall for the safety of our country and all those that have been severely injured and will never again be able to live a normal life without some type of prostetic limb or wheelchair...
To date we have lost 4425 soldiers in Iraq and 1329 soldiers in Afghanistan. Currenty 31902 soldierss have been wounded in Iraq and 7266 have been wounded in Afghanistan.
1. Supporting all troops
2. Showing respect to the families of the men and women we have lost
cause.mission: Honor all those who have given their lives for our countries freedom and security
cause.name: Honor our Fallen Soldiers
